textBeforeTable: BPF Season 33 - 2014 Production History   Links Contact Us Donate Reader Guidelines Read Submitted Scripts Readers Production Guidelines Public Reading Guidelines Submit a Play Playwrights Production History Current Season Productions News Calendar and Events Public Reading Guidelines Production Guidelines The Process About Baltimore Sun -J. Wynn Rousuck If a new-play festival can identify even one promising playwright, it's worth doing. Our mission is to provide an environment that nurtures the talents of Maryland and DC playwrights. The BPF does this through public readings, discussions, critiques and workshopping of new plays. Our summer season is devoted to the presentation of these newly developed works, for the entertainment and cultural edification of our audiences. Showcasing Plays by Maryland and Washington, DC Playwrights
